name: XWUI Portal Component
description: Portal component that renders children into a DOM node outside the component hierarchy. Useful for modals, tooltips, and dropdowns that need to escape parent containers with overflow or z-index constraints.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

container.description: Target container element or selector string. If not provided, creates a new container in document.body

disablePortal.description: Skip portal rendering and render in place

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the portal container

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content element or HTML string to render in the portal

children.description: Children element or HTML string to render in the portal (alias for content)
